title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Yi Jou (Ruby) Liao
text:
Hi friends!
I’m currently a Master of Science student in the Genome Science and Technology (GSAT) program at University of British Columbia (UBC) in Vancouver.
Previously, I graduated from University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) in 2022 with a BS in Computational & Systems Biology with a Concentration in Data Science. I was a Research Assistant at the Graeber Lab, where I contributed to a project characterizing recurrent ovarian cancers and assisted with the UCLA Metabolomics Center.
Check out my CV or LinkedIn for more of my background.
In my free time, I enjoy listening to music (pop/k-pop/indie/electronic) and playing video games (simulation/sandbox/story-driven).

title: Obsidian + Zotero + Drive = <3
text: Through trial and error, I’ve settled on a decent setup for using Obsidian, Zotero, and cloud storage (Google Drive) without paying into any of the cloud storage subscription plans.
